column1: English Sent: The northward drift resulted in the collision of the plate with the much larger Eurasian Plate.
Hindi Tansl: uwwara xiSA kI ora pravAha ke pariNAmasvarUpa ye pleta apane se aXika viSAla pleta
Anu Translation:  uwwaronmuKa aBiprAya_yA arWa kuCa aXika aXika viSAla yUreSiyAI pleVta se pleta kI takkara meM pariNAma nikalA
